title: Already Asia’s Trainer of Choice In The Oil and Manufacturing Sectors, Simply Safety To Target Global Fleet Risk Next—As An AlertDriving Partner

Wed, Jul 29, 2015, 20:00 BST - UK Markets closed Already Asia’s Trainer of Choice In The Oil and Manufacturing Sectors, Simply Safety To Target Global Fleet Risk Next—As An AlertDriving Partner Press Release : AlertDriving – 25 minutes ago Related Content 
TORONTO--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- 
AlertDriving, the global leader in driver risk management, today announced a strategic new channel partnership with Simply Safety, one of Asia’s largest occupational health and environmental safety training consultants. Shell Eastern Petroleum, Tetrapak, Reliance, and Rubicon Offshore are just some of the global companies currently applying Simply Safety’s training systems. The Singapore-based company is one of few in Asia certified to issue International General Certificate (IGC) courses—and in a range of competencies, including health and safety, as well as workplace hazard identification and control. 
Now, as an AlertDriving partner offering FleetDefense SM , Simply Safety can apply its proven risk management approach—all with internationally supported road safety concepts—to identify, mitigate and monitor fleet risk in more than 70 countries worldwide. 
“Supportive of telematics and other programs, FleetDefense SM is preemptive: it targets high-risk attitudes prior to incidents by using fully standardized content localized to cultural practices,” explains Rob Martin, Vice President of Sales at AlertDriving. “Fleets working with Simply Safety will be able to launch centrally managed programs in over 100 languages, and with video of actual hazards filmed where drivers work and live.” 
Simply Safety founder Raj Singh is no stranger to making the global, local. From Afghanistan to Australia, China to the UAE, he has helped students in over 20 countries take their careers to the next level with IGC-certified courses in health and safety. For oil and gas industry professionals, Singh has also developed fully accredited technical and compliance courses, including role-specific training on mandatory WSQ requirements; and of course, OGSC-certified courses addressing the unique, often extreme hazards present at FPSOs, oil rigs and shipyards. 
Ministry of Manpower-approved courses are also available for workers coping daily with confined spaces, heights, and construction risks. 
Companies with tens of thousands of personnel are using Raj Singh’s safety solutions to coordinate operations around the world. They’re also generating millions in revenue—on autopilot. Want to do the same at your company? Visit http://www.simplysafety.com.sg/simplysafety and get started today. 
ABOUT ALERTDRIVING: With over 1 million drivers trained, AlertDriving is dedicated to helping global fleets identify, mitigate and monitor their risk exposure. FleetDefenseSM, the company’s driver risk management suite, combines training in over 100 languages with built-in metrics giving fleets standardized risk reporting anywhere in the world. 
Interested in offering AlertDriving solutions?
